rule: The chosen category for classification must be clearly representational and consistent with the core subject matter of the input text as it fits within the provided category definitions.
input: World Health Organization warns of new pandemic threats
validityText:

It appears to represent a news headline about a warning from the World Health Organization regarding new pandemic threats. The subject matter pertains to international health concerns, which can be classified under the "World" news category as it involves global implications and the World Health Organization is an international body. There are no length restrictions on the input specified, so the length is not an issue. The language of the input is English, which is typically what the chatbot is trained to process.

No violation.
OK
coverageEvalText:

There are no additional elements in the output that violate the description, and the output directly corresponds to one of the acceptable categories.

No violation.
OK
